channel.title: I place NPC in autospawn

item.title: I place NPC in autospawn
item.dc:creator: @DePredaTe DePredaTe
item.description:
@DePredaTe wrote:

I place an npc (Sir Bedivere) (242) and i go into game and it isnâ€™t there. So i go into the NPCHandler and type this:

                                    }
                                    if (npcs[i].npcType == 242) { // Sir Bedivere - Sir Bedivere
					if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "I type some stuff in here";
					}

I go into game and it still does not work. I even tried doing the command ::pnpc but it doesnt do anything either!!! Please help me
